pageTitle: Which form do you need? - Report a terminally ill patient - GOV.UK

radios.text1: DS1500 (patient may have 0 to 6 months left to live)
radios.text2: SR1 (patient may have 6 to 12 months left to live)

insetText: You will not face any negative consequences from the factual information you supply.

selectForm.empty: Select if you need to complete a DS1500 or an SR1 for your patient
